channel.title: Website on Tiernan's Comms Closet
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Tiernan's Comms Closet

item.title: Testing Forestry
item.description: So, as you probably know, this site is built with Jekyll. Jekyll is a Static Site Generator, basically taking an input of a load of text files (see the source repo for this site on Github here) and generating a load more HTML (the static HTML is hosted on Github here, which auto publishes to Azure App Service). In previous posts, i have talked about using the likes of Visual Studio Code and Mark Down Monster to build the site.
